mapper.update:
update toa_machine_restart set
EQUIPMENT_NUMBER=#{equipmentNumber},
DIVICE_NUMBER=#{diviceNumber},
EQUIPMENT_ID=#{equipmentId},
COMPANY_ID=#{companyId},
COMPANY_NAME=#{companyName},
MACHINA=#{machina},
ENGINE_ROOM=#{engineRoom},
CABINET_NUMBER=#{cabinetNumber},

TEL=#{tel},
CONTACT_WAY=#{contactWay},
IP=#{ip},
CAOZGCS=#{caozgcs},
OPERATE_DATE=#{operateDate},
END_DATE=#{endDate},
BILL_DATE=#{billDate},
WARN_DATE=#{warnDate},
REMARK=#{remark},
STATUS=#{status},
IS_MONITOR=#{isMonitor},
DEVICE_STATUS=#{deviceStatus},
IS_WRONG=#{isWrong},
ERROR_MESSAGE=#{errorMessage},
DESCRIPTION=#{description},
RECOED_PEOPLE=#{recoedPeople},
ERROR_REPAIR=#{errorRepair},
IS_OVERTIME=#{isOvertime},
CHARGE_EXAMINE=#{chargeExamine},
CHARGE_INFORMATION=#{chargeInformation},
REGION_EXAMINE=#{regionExamine},
REGION_INFORMATION=#{regionInformation},
SN=#{sn},
FIRST_RESTART=#{firstRestart},
ASSIST=#{assist},
SCAN_CODE=#{scanCode},
APPLICANT=#{applicant},
CABINET=#{cabinet},
BRAND=#{brand},
MODEL_NUMBER=#{modelNumber},
OPERATION_TYPE=#{operationType},
WORK_TIME=#{workTime},
EXECUTIVE_OUTCOME=#{executiveOutcome},
CONTENT_VIEWED=#{contentViewed},
DIEWCT_OPERATION=#{diewctOperation},
OUTSIDE_INFORMATION=#{outsideInformation},
OUTSIDE_SPECIFICATION=#{outsideSpecification},
CONNECTION_INFORMATION=#{connectionInformation},
EXTERNAL_EQUIPMENT=#{externalEquipment},
NETWORK_INFORMATION=#{networkInformation},
PORT_RESULT=#{portResult},
ESTIMATED_TIME=#{estimatedTime},
PLACE_STORAGE=#{placeStorage},
CONNECT_WIRES=#{connectWires},
IP_CONFIGURATION=#{ipConfiguration},
IP_EMLY=#{ipEmly},
CONFIGURATION_TYPE=#{configurationType},
SYSTEM_TYPE=#{systemType},
PARTITION_REQUIREMENTS=#{partitionRequirements},
REMOTE_DESKTOP=#{remoteDesktop},
LONG_DISTANCE=#{longDistance},
CURRENT_SITE=#{currentSite},
CURRENT_USER_NAME=#{currentUserName},

TEST_OUTCOME=#{testOutcome},
STATISTICAL_LISTING=#{statisticalListing},
SALES_EXPERS=#{salesExpers},

CREATE_USER=#{createUser},
CREATE_USER_DEPT=#{createUserDept},
CREATE_USER_ORG=#{createUserOrg},

MODIFY_USER=#{modifyUser},
MODIFY_DATE=#{modifyDate},
EXT_STR1=#{extStr1},
EXT_STR2=#{extStr2},
EXT_STR3=#{extStr3},
EXT_STR4=#{extStr4},
EXT_STR5=#{extStr5},
EXT_DATE1=#{extDate1},
EXT_DATE2=#{extDate2},
EXT_NUM1=#{extNum1},
EXT_NUM2=#{extNum2},
EXT_NUM3=#{extNum3},
MODIFY_DATE = #{modifyDateNew} where ID = #{id} and MODIFY_DATE = #{modifyDate}
